definitions.definition: A broad, well-paved and landscaped thoroughfare .
The landscaping on the sides of a boulevard or other thoroughfare.
A strip of land between a street and sidewalk.
The grassy area in the middle of some streets; A refuge island .

main_definition: A broad, well-paved and landscaped thoroughfare .
secondary_definitions: The landscaping on the sides of a boulevard or other thoroughfare.
A strip of land between a street and sidewalk.
( Upper Midwestern US ) The grassy area in the middle of some streets; A refuge island .
